captions.text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
-Hey, guys.

It's Brooklyn and Bailey, and
welcome to our bonus video.

It's the Christmas
season, so we just

wanted to wish you all a Merry
Christmas, a happy season.
-Happy Hanukkah.

-Whatever it is that
you all celebrate.

And since we can't all send you
a personal, physical Christmas

card, we figured we'd send you
a virtual emoji holiday carol
video.

-Yes, AT&T has
created this new tool

where you can make an
emoji holiday carol
video on your own.

And so we went ahead and created
our own video, especially
for you guys.

Because we are
working with AT&T,

they have allowed us to put our
emoji holiday carol video (BOTH
) in this video.
-So here it is.
Enjoy.

[MUSIC "WE WISH YOU A MERRY
 CHRISTMAS"]

-If you were paying
close enough attention,

you will notice that
there is an emoji on there

that you probably have
never seen before,

and that's because [LAUGHS]
we made our own emoji.
-And it looks just like us.
-Ah!
-Cheese!

-That's because we used a
thing called Emoji Me, where

you can basically
make your own emoji.
And so we made one of ourselves.
-And we get to keep it, too.
-And we get to keep it, too.
-It's pretty cool.

If you guys want to create
you own emoji holiday carol,

then you can click the link
in the desscription box below.

-And we just want to wish you
guys happy holidays again.
We really appreciate y'all.
-We love you guys so much.

-And we will see
you guys next week.
Bye.
-Bye.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
